content.raw:
If it helps, here is the contents of the Dockerfile that I’m using; this is mainly the Dockerfile that came from the subt repo following the Docker build instructions, but you can see on line 86 that I’ve added the prerelease repo. That correctly causes the prerelease versions of the packages to be pulled in, as suggested above. I’m building/launching this using the build.sh and run.sh scripts from the subt repo.

[https://bitbucket.org/snippets/estump-arl/5AA7EG](https://bitbucket.org/snippets/estump-arl/5AA7EG)
